attributes.title: This app is very inappropriate
attributes.review: This app had very bad stuff that is why it is age restricted. It had Trump do bad stuff and he is a bad person for doing this ,I hate him and so does every one else . THIS IS A BAD APP DONT GET IT EWWW

attributes.title: Chile Trump
attributes.review: Omg I opened the app and a bug crawled out my phone like the weird girl in the TV. Trump is giving people an app that releases bugs through your phone, he deserves the worst punishment. DELETE THE APP #Tiktok #Blessed

attributes.title: DISGUSTED
attributes.review: I DOWNLOAD THE APP AND AS SOON AS I OPEN IT THIS WEIRD ORANGE THING WITH A TURKEY GOBLER IS ON THE FRONT PAGE??? not only that, the app took approximately a WEEK to download and took up ALL of my storage. I ALSO HAVE A QUESTION! Why was this app in so many ads?? Don’t you know ALL APPS MATTER?? Take it down! 🍤🍊

attributes.title: Almost killed my self

attributes.title: This is awful

attributes.title: Ewww
